summary: When a liberal music station's owners decide to introduce army recruitment ads, despite the protests of its manager, the rebellious DJs are determined to fight back, no matter the cost.
cast: Michael Brandon|Eileen Brennan|Alex Karras|Cleavon Little|Martin Mull|Cassie Yates|Norman Lloyd|Jay Fenichel|James Keach|Joe Smith|Tom Tarpey|Janet Brandt|Mary Torrey|Roberta Wallach|Terry Jastrow|Cissy Wellman|Robert Patten|Karen Ciral|Brenda Venus|Martina Ritt|Don Dolan|David Matthau|John Larson|Phillip Epstein|Peter Fox|Bo Kaprall|Keith Lane Jensen|Patricia Marlowe|Tammy Masters|Paul Menzel|Louis Messina|Andrea Claudio|Linda Ronstadt|Jimmy Buffett|Tom Petty|Kevin Cronin|Gary Richrath|Alan Gratzer|Bruce Hall|Neal Doughty|Joseph Mendez|Marty Thomas|Jeffrey Weissman
title: Fiebre musical
